mapper.insert: insert into product(product_name, product_manufacturer, product_price, product_stock, product_point, product_seller, product_score, category_code) values (#{product_name}, #{product_manufacturer}, #{product_price}, #{product_stock}, #{product_point}, #{product_seller}, #{product_score} ,#{category_code})
mapper.select: select product_name, product_manufacturer, product_price, product_score from product
select count(*) from product where category_code=#{category_code}
